pull.title: kernel: chainparams updates for 26.x
pull.body:
Update chainparams pre `26.x` branch off.

Note: Remember that some variance is expected in the m_assumed_* sizes.

Closes #28572.

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#26201](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/26201) (Remove Taproot activation height by Sjors)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

ACK 817c7cd020c8e4a7e1787bce2e1a2f1d11e91b5f

Consider merging #25970 first and also doing the steps there, perhaps? Can easily be deferred 'til after branch off and next release though.

issue.title: Remove Taproot activation height
issue.body:
Drop `DEPLOYMENT_TAPROOT` from `consensus.vDeployments`.

Now that the commit (https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/7c08d81e119570792648fe95bbacddbb1d5f9ae2) which changes taproot to be enforced for all blocks ~is sufficiently buried by other commits, and thus less likely to be reverted~ is included in v24.0, it seems a good time to remove no longer needed non-consensus code.

Clarify what is considered a `BuriedDeployment`.

We drop taproot from `getdeploymentinfo` RPC, rather than mark it as `buried`, because this is not a buried deployment in the sense of [BIP 90](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0090.mediawiki). This is because the activation height has been completely removed from the code, rather than hard coded.

See discussion in #24737 and #26162.

events.body:
ACK 817c7cd020c8e4a7e1787bce2e1a2f1d11e91b5f

See [release-process.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/release-process.md#before-branch-off) for how to verify these numbers.

events.body:
> Consider merging https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/25970 first and also doing the steps there, perhaps?

Incorporated this. We haven't changed the values since the initial merge. Updating now seems ok.
